definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Mr Bush senior reduced Mr Dukakis to the candidate of card-carrying liberal elitists .
sentences.chinese: 老布什也曾经攻击杜卡基斯是招牌式的自由派精英。

sentences.english: The liberal candidate was accused by his conservation opponent of being a bleeding heart on welfare issues.
sentences.chinese: 自由派候选人在福利问题上被保守派对手斥为老好人。

sentences.english: Why would a liberal support a regime that oppresses and imprisons its people?
sentences.chinese: 为什么自由派支持的政权会压迫和禁锢它的人民呢？

sentences.english: It is the result of the seeds godless liberals have sown for years.
sentences.chinese: 这是由于罪恶的自由派已播下的种子多年。

sentences.english: Pro-market liberals are urging Beijing to push ahead with more economic reforms, despite the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 亲市场的自由派敦促北京推动更多经济改革。

sentences.english: Liberals will try to goad incoming leaders into making their views clear.
sentences.chinese: 自由派正试图促使未来的领导人表明自己的观点。

sentences.english: This is often the case with liberals and conservatives.
sentences.chinese: 自由派与保守派之争多是如此。

sentences.english: We have the extreme conservatives but we also have the extreme liberals.
sentences.chinese: 我们中有保守派也有自由派。

sentences.english: He is a conservative bucking the tide in liberal Washington.
sentences.chinese: 他在自由派气息浓厚的华盛顿是位反潮流的保守派。

sentences.english: We all know he is going to pick a more liberal justice.
sentences.chinese: 我们都知道他会选一个更倾向自由派的法官。

sentences.english: That said, almost all of the attendees are politically liberal.
sentences.chinese: 据说，几乎所有的与会者在政治上都是自由派。

sentences.english: Liberalism placed its hopes in human perfectibility.
sentences.chinese: 自由派将他们的希望放在人类的可完善性上。

sentences.english: How do you deal with the liberals, your people?
sentences.chinese: 你如何对待自由派，你的人民？

sentences.english: The green recovery plan was incubated at a liberal thinktank, the Centre for American Progress.
sentences.chinese: 绿色恢复计划在自由派智库美国进步中心孕育产生。

sentences.english: Now, the army is gambling on the liberal opposition for the same goal.
sentences.chinese: 如今，军方故技重施，押宝自由派反对者。

sentences.english: Liberal and Christian members of the assembly boycotted it.
sentences.chinese: 委员会中的自由派和基督教派联合抵制这项草案。

definition: the Narodniks, Russian populist group in the 19th century
